short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keeps you up to date on illiniboard.com articles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will keep track of the articles you've viewed on illiniboard.com and show you the most recent articles you haven't read.

A badge will appear on the extension's icon, alerting you when new articles are published.
